title: Three including mother and son reported missing while sea bathing
body_lines: Three people, including a mother (55) and son (16), are reported missing while bathing in the sea area off Ambalantota.
According to Ada Derana correspondent, the trio had visited a temple in the Welipatanwila area, Ambalantota before going to the beach.
Among the victims is the 22-year-old son of the deceased woman’s sister.
